meanings.definition: A strong, heated container used for chemical reactions and other processes involving high pressures and temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The autoclave heated up to sterilize the medical instruments.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory technician placed the tools in the autoclave for sterilization.
meanings.sent3: The autoclave was so hot, it could probably cook an egg!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an autoclave, applying pressure until success was achieved.
meanings.sent5: The autoclave roared to life, ready to purify everything within.

meanings.definition: To sterilize or disinfect using an autoclave.
meanings.sent1: The hospital staff autoclaved the surgical equipment before the operation.
meanings.sent2: She autoclaved the glassware to ensure it was free from any contaminants.
meanings.sent3: He autoclaved his lucky socks before the big game for extra cleanliness!
meanings.sent4: Her words autoclaved the doubts in his mind, leaving only certainty.
meanings.sent5: The steam from the autoclave billowed out, signaling the completion of the sterilization process.
